      • addMovieRole

        @RequestMapping(path="/role/{movieId}/{roleId}",
                method=PUT)
public void addMovieRole(@PathVariable
                                                                                                        int movieId,
                                                                                                        @PathVariable
                                                                                                        int roleId)
        Given a movie ID (int) and a role ID (int), add that role to that movie.
        Parameters:
        movieId - An int that is a valid ID for a movie.
        roleId - An int that is a valid ID for a role.
        See Also:
        Movie, Role

      • jsonHome

        @RequestMapping(path="/role",
                method=GET)
public java.util.List<tiy.com.Movies.Role> jsonHome(java.lang.String fName,
                                                                                                                java.lang.String lName,
                                                                                                                java.lang.String birthday,
                                                                                                                java.lang.String bio)
        Given a first name, last name, birthday, and / or bio find Roles that match.
        Parameters:
        fName - A String that could be part or all of a first name.
        lName - A String that could be part or all of a last name.
        birthday - A String that could be part or all of a birthday.
        bio - A String that could be part or all of a bio.
        Returns:
        roleList a list of matching roles
        See Also:
        Role
